data.title: Cisco Small Business
data.meta_description: Lower Communications Expenses Web-based Management Integrated Wireless Networking Wide Variety of Phones Built for Small Business
data.text:
Cisco offers a complete line of solutions for your small business. They specialize in a Unified Communications phone system that allows you to upgrade your old PBX system. With a complete line of phones that integrate seamlessly with their systems you have the complete package. Plus, Cisco offers a wide range of products for small businesses like Switches, WAPs, Security and Storage.

UC320W Small Office Phone System

Supports up to 24 employees.

Business-class calling and messaging.

Full key system and small PBX features.

Flexible to support Cisco IP phones and wireless networking.

Designed with the small business owner in mind.

SPA500 Series IP Phones

Wideband audio gives you better clarity and speaker quality.

Full-duplex speakerphone, headset, message waiting indicator and dynamic softkeys.

4-way navigation key.

Integrated Ethernet switch port.

Port for SPA500S expansion modules.

Other Small Business Solutions

As we look to upgrade or expand your network, Cisco offers a wide range of products that help us cover the following areas:

Switches and Routers

Wireless Access Points (WAPs)

Network Security

Video and Conferencing
